entry.title: Key point 👇👇👇 Crypto stablecoins depeg all the time. USDC will be stronger for this
entry.summary:
Key point 👇👇👇 Crypto stablecoins depeg all the time. USDC will be stronger for this
Doug Colkitt (🐊,🐊): Everybody saying a stablecoin depegging to 95 cents for a weekend means nobody will use it ever again... Kinda forgetting when UST depegged for a few days then 5X'd TVL in the next year, despite the depegging itself being explicitly caused by it being a non-collateralized ponzi

entry.title: RT Balaji: Thinking this through, it’s the type of government-caused crisis that could lead to a CBDC. Because I don’t know how businesses could pra...
entry.summary:
RT Balaji Thinking this through, it’s the type of government-caused crisis that could lead to a CBDC. Because I don’t know how businesses could practically operate with only a $250k max in each account. They’d have to keep buying and selling T-bills. Instead they’d want to somehow send… https://twitter.com/i/web/status/1634553488700223488
Naval: If businesses lose money on deposit, then every business in the country will move all cash above $250K into Treasuries and we’ll have a system-wide bank run at Twitter speed.
